HTMLEmbedElement.summary: The HTMLEmbedElement interface provides special properties (beyond the regular interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating {{HTMLElement("embed")}} elements.

blockquote.para: This topic describes the HTMLEmbedElement interface as defined in the standard. It does not address earlier, non-standardized version of the interface.

remarks.para: -The HTML element implementing this interface: embed

HTMLEmbedElementWidth.summary: The width property of the interface returns a string that reflects the width attribute of the embed element, indicating the displayed width of the resource in CSS pixels.
HTMLEmbedElementWidth.value: A string indicating the displayed width of the resource in CSS pixels.

HTMLEmbedElementGetSVGDocument.summary: The getSVGDocument() method of the interface returns the object of the embedded SVG.

HTMLEmbedElementSrc.summary: The src property of the interface returns a string that indicates the URL of the resource being embedded.

remarks.para: It reflects the src attribute of the embed element.

HTMLEmbedElementHeight.summary: The height property of the interface returns a string that reflects the height attribute of the embed element, indicating the displayed height of the resource in CSS pixels.
HTMLEmbedElementHeight.value: A string indicating the displayed height of the resource in CSS pixels.

HTMLEmbedElementType.summary: The type property of the interface returns a string that reflects the type attribute of the {{HTMLElement("embed")}} element, indicating the MIME type of the resource. It reflects the {{htmlelement("embed")}} element's type attribute

remarks.para:
-
-
-Media types found on the web
-Important MIME types for web developers

HTMLEmbedElementType.value: A string; the MIME type of the resource.
